projects.title: BLOG
projects.description: This a blog that i did for a course in Coderhouse. I had to use Django, HTML and CSS. I really like Django for the backend and im going to learn more so i can make bigger projects with this incredible framework.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: This calculator was a project from The Odin Project. I did all the Foundation course and i learned JAVASCRIPT, CSS and HTML.
